title: Calories in Fat Free Milk
meta_description: Discover calories in fat free milk per cup, including protein, carbs, fat details, and nutrition breakdowns for easy tracking.
assumptions: Fat-free (skim) cow's milk, pasteurized; standard 1 cup serving (240 ml); no added flavors or sweeteners.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fortification, processing, and serving size. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One cup of fat-free milk provides ~83 kcal and ~8 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Chocolate fat-free milk (added cocoa and sugar)

faqs.q: How many calories in one cup of fat free milk?
Is fat free milk high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, about 8.3 g protein per cup.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in fat free milk?
faqs.a: Around 12.2 g carbs, mostly from natural lactose sugars.

faqs.q: Does fat free milk have any fat?
faqs.a: Minimal, only 0.2 g total fat per cup.

faqs.q: How does fat free milk compare to whole milk calories?
faqs.a: Fat free has ~83 kcal per cup; whole milk has ~150 kcal.
